title: introduce uniqueBlockQuery(parent:true) aggregation for JSON Facet
description: It might be faster twin for uniqueBlock(_root_). Please utilise buildin query parsing method, don't invent your own.

comments.content:
Yep, this should be pretty easy to do, following the same type of strategy as uniqueBlock.
I wish we had named parameters for the function parser already... then we could use uniqueBlock(parents=type:product) and avoid another function name.
comments.author: Yonik Seeley
